column4: hello i have a netgear wg 111 v2 and a laptop with ubuntu 7.04 alternative and it cant see it any resone why?
well you got windows or linux?
hello i have a netgear wg 111 v2 and a laptop with ubuntu 7.04 alternative and it cant see it any resone why? can someone help after there done?
hello i have GRUB error 17 how can i fix this?
have you searched google? or the ubuntu forums? I've seen so many people ask about grub error 17 there must be an answer somewhere
too bad I wasn't paying attention when those other people asked or I could have helped you =/
iv looked a round and most of them need a live cd to recover i use a alternitive installtion so what can i do?
yes.. I think you'll need a live cd... can't you download and burn one of the ubuntu installation cd's?
my pc will not run a live cd it only has 128 mb
ahh.. how did you install it? using the alternate install cd?
I'm wondering if grub doesn't have a small restore cd of their own
i got a rescue mode on the alternitive disk
ah.. that sounds like a good thing.. tried it?
here is one rescue-disk thingy http://geocities.com/supergrubdisk/
